thread.title: How The Walking Dead Just Subtly Confirmed That Jesus Is Gay
thread.title_full: How The Walking Dead Just Subtly Confirmed That Jesus Is Gay

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: How The Walking Dead Just Subtly Confirmed That Jesus Is Gay
text:
Is Jesus Gay on The Walking Dead? How The Walking Dead Just Subtly Confirmed That Jesus Is Gay March 20, 2017 407 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
If you've been reading The Walking Dead comic books in addition to watching the show, then you know there are some big differences between Robert Kirkman's books and AMC's series . Thankfully, the writers have chosen to keep one element: Jesus is still gay. On Sunday's episode, he's casually talking about how he doesn't have much luck with people, including boyfriends. There it is! 
While it hadn't been explicitly stated on the show at the time, actor Tom Payne essentially confirmed the character's orientation in an interview with AOL in 2016. "He's a badass and he happens to be gay," he said. "I see no reason why that would be different in the show." Check out the clip: 
You go, Jesus.
